format: A data frame with 61 observations on the following 3 variables.
reference:
Here the interest lies in uncovering the effect of genotype of mother and litter on 
litter weight.
title: Foster Feeding Experiment
description:
Description
The data are from a foster feeding experiment
with rat mothers and litters of four different genotypes.
The measurement is the litter weight after
a trial feeding period.

parameters.weight: the weight of the litter after a feeding period.
parameters.motgen:
genotype of the mother, a factor with levels 
A, B, I, and J.
parameters.litgen:
genotype of the litter, a factor with levels 
A, B, I, and J.
